name: BiotechBeauty - Prebiotics, Probiotics, and Postbiotics
description: BiotechBeauty offers science-backed prebiotics, probiotics, and postbiotics derived from oat, soy, glucomannan, and ginseng. Their comprehensive approach to microbiome science provides multiple mechanisms of skin microbiome support through carefully selected botanical sources with documented efficacy.
notes: Comprehensive approach covering prebiotics, probiotics, and postbiotics. Botanical sources (oat, soy, glucomannan, ginseng) provide natural positioning. Science-backed formulations ensure efficacy. Educational content demonstrates expertise.
